template.name: van-row
template.description: Vant Quickly and easily create layouts with van-row and van-col

variable.name: span
variable.expression: Number of column the grid spans

variable.name: type
variable.expression: Can be set to primary warning danger

variable.name: click
variable.expression: Triggered when click button and not disabled or loading

template.name: van-list
template.description: A list component to show items and control loading status.

variable.name: vModel
variable.expression: Whether to show loading info，the load event will not be triggered when loading

variable.name: finished
variable.expression: Whether loading is finished，the load event will not be triggered when finished

variable.name: load
variable.expression: Triggered when the distance between the scrollbar and the bottom is less than offset

variable.name: mode
variable.expression: Mode, can be set to closeable link

variable.name: mode
variable.expression: Mode, can be set to simple multi

variable.name: showPageSize
variable.expression: Count of page size to show

variable.name: position
variable.expression: Can be set to top bottom right left

variable.name: type
variable.expression: Type, can be set to primary success danger

variable.name: theme
variable.expression: Keyboard theme，can be set to default custom

variable.name: blur
variable.expression: Triggered when click close button or blur keyboard

template.name: van-password-input
template.description: The PasswordInput component is usually used with NumberKeyboard Component.

variable.name: blur
variable.expression: Triggered when click close button or blur keyboard

template.name: van-radio-group:cell
template.value: <van-radio-group v-model="$vModel$"> <van-cell-group> <van-cell title="$title1$" clickable @click="$click1$"> <van-radio name="$name1$"></van-radio> </van-cell> <van-cell title="$title2$" clickable @click="$click2$"> <van-radio name="$name2$"></van-radio> </van-cell> </van-cell-group> </van-radio-group>

template.name: van-datetime-picker
template.description: The DatetimePicker component is usually used with Popup Component.

variable.name: type
variable.expression: Can be set to date, time, year-month

template.name: van-datetime-picker:date
template.description: The DatetimePicker component is usually used with Popup Component.

variable.name: type
variable.expression: Can be set to date, time, year-month

template.name: van-datetime-picker:year-month
template.description: The DatetimePicker component is usually used with Popup Component.

variable.name: type
variable.expression: Can be set to date, time, year-month

template.name: van-datetime-picker:time
template.description: The DatetimePicker component is usually used with Popup Component.

variable.name: type
variable.expression: Can be set to date, time, year-month

template.name: van-dialog:advanced
template.value: <van-dialog v-model="$vModel$" show-cancel-button :before-close="$beforeClose$"> <van-field v-model="$vModel1$" label="$label1$" placeholder="$placeholder1$"></van-field> <van-field v-model="$vModel2$" type="$type$" label="$label2$" placeholder="$placeholder2$"></van-field> </van-dialog>

variable.name: beforeClose
variable.expression: Callback before close, call done() to close dialog, call done(false) to cancel loading

template.name: van-picker
template.description: The Picker component is usually used with Popup Component.

template.name: van-picker:toolbar
template.description: The Picker component is usually used with Popup Component.

template.name: van-picker:loading
template.description: The Picker component is usually used with Popup Component.

variable.name: rightWidth
variable.expression: Width of the right scrollable area

variable.name: leftWidth
variable.expression: Width of the left scrollable area

variable.name: rightWidth
variable.expression: Width of the right scrollable area

variable.name: leftWidth
variable.expression: Width of the left scrollable area

template.name: van-switch-cell
template.description: Vant SwitchCell component is an encapsulation of Switch and Cell.

variable.name: items
variable.expression: Required datasets for the component, see Data Structure for detail.

variable.name: mainActiveIndex
variable.expression: The index of selected parent node

variable.name: onNavClick
variable.expression: triggered when parent node is selected

variable.name: disabledText
variable.defaultValue: "The following address is out of range"

template.name: van-area
template.description: The Area component is usually used with Popup Component.

template.name: van-area:initial
template.description: The Area component is usually used with Popup Component.

template.name: van-area:columns
template.description: The Area component is usually used with Popup Component.

template.name: van-card:advanced

variable.name: size1
variable.expression: Can be set to normal, large, small or mini

variable.name: size2
variable.expression: Can be set to normal, large, small or mini

variable.name: type
variable.expression: Can be set to add or edit

template.name: van-goods-action
template.value: <van-goods-action> <van-goods-action-mini-btn icon="$icon1$" text="$text1$" @click="$click1$"></van-goods-action-mini-btn> <van-goods-action-mini-btn icon="$icon2$" text="$text2$" @click="$click2$"></van-goods-action-mini-btn> <van-goods-action-big-btn text="$text3$" @click="$click3$"></van-goods-action-big-btn> <van-goods-action-big-btn text="$text4$" @click="$click4$" primary ></van-goods-action-big-btn> </van-goods-action>

template.name: van-goods-action:info
template.value: <van-goods-action> <van-goods-action-mini-btn icon="$icon1$" text="$text1$" @click="$click1$"></van-goods-action-mini-btn> <van-goods-action-mini-btn icon="$icon2$" text="$text2$" info="$info$"></van-goods-action-mini-btn> <van-goods-action-mini-btn icon="$icon3$" text="$text3$"></van-goods-action-mini-btn> <van-goods-action-big-btn text="$text4$"></van-goods-action-big-btn> <van-goods-action-big-btn text="$text5$" primary ></van-goods-action-big-btn> </van-goods-action>

variable.name: resetStepperOnHide
variable.expression: Whether to reset stepper when hide

variable.name: resetSelectedSkuOnHide
variable.expression: Whether to reset selected sku when hide

variable.name: closeOnClickOverlay
variable.expression: Whether to close sku popup when click overlay
